trans-unit.source: Represents the C14N XML canonicalization transform for a digital signature as defined by the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C), with comments.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta la trasformazione di canonizzazione C14N XML per una firma digitale, come definito dal World Wide Web Consortium (W3C), con i commenti.

trans-unit.source: The XmlDsigC14NWithCommentsTransform class represents the C14N XML canonicalization transform that describes the canonical form of an XML document.
trans-unit.target: La classe XmlDsigC14NWithCommentsTransform rappresenta la trasformazione di canonizzazione C14N XML che descrive la forma canonica di un documento XML.

trans-unit.source: This transform allows a signer to create a digest using the canonical form of an XML document.
trans-unit.target: Questa trasformazione consente a un firmatario creare un digest usando la forma canonica di un documento XML.

trans-unit.source: A recipient can then verify the digital signature using the same canonical form of the XML document with the same transform.
trans-unit.target: Un destinatario può quindi verificare la firma digitale usando la stessa forma canonica del documento XML con la stessa trasformazione.

trans-unit.source: Use the XmlDsigC14NWithCommentsTransform class when you need to sign an XML document that contains comments.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare la classe XmlDsigC14NWithCommentsTransform quando è necessario firmare un documento XML che contiene i commenti.

trans-unit.source: Note that you cannot directly create a new instance of a canonicalization transform class.
trans-unit.target: Si noti che è possibile creare direttamente una nuova istanza di una classe di trasformazione di canonizzazione.

trans-unit.source: To specify a canonicalization transform, pass the Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) that describes the transform to the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedInfo.CanonicalizationMethod%2A> property, which is accessible from the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.SignedInfo%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Per specificare una trasformazione di canonizzazione, passare la risorsa identificatore URI (Uniform) che descrive la trasformazione per il <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedInfo.CanonicalizationMethod%2A>accessibile dalla proprietà di <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.SignedInfo%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.SignedInfo%2A> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedInfo.CanonicalizationMethod%2A>

trans-unit.source: To acquire a reference to the canonicalization transform, use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedInfo.CanonicalizationMethodObject%2A> property, which is accessible from the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.SignedInfo%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Per acquisire un riferimento per la trasformazione di canonizzazione, utilizzare il <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedInfo.CanonicalizationMethodObject%2A>accessibile dalla proprietà di <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.SignedInfo%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.SignedInfo%2A> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedInfo.CanonicalizationMethodObject%2A>

trans-unit.source: The URI that describes the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigExcC14NWithCommentsTransform> class is defined by the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigExcC14NWithCommentsTransformUrl> field.
trans-unit.target: L'URI che descrive la <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigExcC14NWithCommentsTransform>classe viene definita la <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigExcC14NWithCommentsTransformUrl>campo.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigExcC14NWithCommentsTransformUrl> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigExcC14NWithCommentsTransform>

trans-unit.source: The URI that describes the XmlDsigC14NWithCommentsTransform class is defined by the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigC14NWithCommentsTransformUrl> field and the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigCanonicalizationWithCommentsUrl> field.
trans-unit.target: L'URI che descrive la classe XmlDsigC14NWithCommentsTransform è definito per il <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigC14NWithCommentsTransformUrl>campo e <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigCanonicalizationWithCommentsUrl>campo.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigCanonicalizationWithCommentsUrl> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigC14NWithCommentsTransformUrl>

trans-unit.source: For more information about the C14N with comments transform, see Sections 6.5 and 6.6.1 of the XMLDSIG specification, which is available from the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) at www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sul C14N con commenti, vedere le sezioni 6.5 e 6.6.1 della specifica XMLDSIG, disponibile tramite il World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) al www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/.

trans-unit.source: The canonicalization algorithm is defined in the W3C Canonical XML specification, which is available at www.w3.org/TR/xml-c14n.
trans-unit.target: L'algoritmo di canonizzazione è definito nella specifica W3C XML in formato canonico, disponibile all'indirizzo www.w3.org/TR/xml-c14n.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigC14NWithCommentsTransform"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigC14NWithCommentsTransform"> </xref> classe.
